channel.title: How to make a .exe?
channel.description:
Hello, I was thinking if it is possible to make SCAR script acually into .exe format? So you don't need SCAR to use it. Like: you just double click the icon and autotalker opens, I could compare it to like keygen. :)
If it is possible, how? :)
Here is my script, it doesn't really use a SCAR, it doesn't require that crosshair dragging or any color picking and etc.: [url=http://www.secetweb.com/SecetTalker2dot4.rar]www.secetweb.com/SecetTalker2dot4.rar[/url]
Thanks

item.title: How to make a .exe?
item.dc:creator: @xtremekilling xtremekilling
item.description:
@xtremekilling wrote:

its fairly easy, all you have to do is create a db, and have it record the link with the username/pass dat scar sent.

I won’t tell u how, or what “db” is. I have given too much info anyways.

and if u do know what “db” is, Please don’t tell ^ - ^, We don’t want keyloggers!

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a .exe?
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

XxKanexX:

Someone could just make it Login to Runescape, add them as a friend and send them the players password.

That would work, but it would be fairly unreliable. Wouldn’t the (lame) scammer have to be on 24/7, or create their own client that records messages?

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a .exe?
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Kaitnieks was thinking of doing this, But the possibility of Keyloggers and crazy people who would take over the computer was to risky.

Someone could just make it Login to Runescape, add them as a friend and send them the players password.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a .exe?
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

suck my r2h:

but it can’t actually compile/link a script into an .exe

No, it can compile :P. Just not into an .exe.

Kaitniek didn’t add the feature to allow you to compile it into an .exe because SCAR has protection that asks you if it can send data to a server (so it doesn’t send your password). If it was an .exe, it would just send it without asking you first, so it would be easy to make an account stealer (that wouldn’t be considered a keylogger).

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a .exe?
item.dc:creator: @suck_my_r2h suck my r2h
item.description:
@suck_my_r2h wrote:

You can’t do that. SCAR executes the script code, but it can’t actually compile/link a script into an .exe

I suppose that this is for protection to prevent people from creating viruses and masquerading them as compiled SCAR scripts…

Read full topic
